extracted_playbook.title: Identify ClamAV Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine the installed version of ClamAV to check if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade ClamAV from 0.104 to a Supported Version
extracted_playbook.description: ClamAV 0.104 has reached end-of-life and will not be patched. Upgrade to a supported version immediately.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the ClamAV version 0.103.7 or earlier, 0.105.1 or earlier, or 1.0.0 or earlier?

extracted_playbook.title: Install ClamAV Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Install the latest updates for ClamAV to mitigate the vulnerability.
